Today in County Clare, surf is quiet with 1 ft @9s WNW and fresh 14 mph ENE winds. Tomorrow remains similar with 1 ft @11s WNW and light 5 mph NE winds, not producing much. Day after, conditions improve to 2 ft @13s W with light 5 mph NE winds, offering some fun at spots like Lahinch Beach and Cregg Beach. Best: day after.
